title: @Riot - Gatekeeper Galio in the VGU
body: Will you guys be making Gatekeeper Galio a legit, modern 1820 skin worthy of sitting beside Star Guardian Jinx, Omega Squad Teemo, and Mecha Zero Sion? I feel like you guys kinds half-assed bringing Firefighter Tristana up to par (only adding particles), and I personally love Gatekeeper Galio and want it to be a lot better than what it is now.

replies.body: Gatekeeper Galio will definitely be the biggest skin ChampUp has ever done. I wouldn't expect it to be as big as a modern legendary skin as those take a insane amount of time to make, and wouldn't really be worth delaying the Galio VGU by that long. It will however be much more legendary then Firefighter Tristana. It will have everything that current Gatekeeper has (Unique VO, Anims, FX.) He will have a similar number of VO lines that a modern legendary has though and whatever else extra we can squeeze in.
he'll also get a new splash art if i remember correctly
All our VGU skins get new splash art
even Debonair?
It will at least be updated to match the new model even if it isn't redone from scratch

Are you giving Debonair a completely new model? I feel like the skin has a lot of potential (even for a 750 RP one). I hope you guys give him a jaw at least as wide as it is currently in the splash (which I really love).

As with all our VGUs, we build the champion from scratch as if it were a new champion. This means that none of the old skin models work anymore. which means that we have to build all the skins from scratch as well.

Awesome! I'd personally love if you kept Debonair Galio's 'attractiveness' with the update.
Looking forward to it as a whole anyways. :D
and for Warwick, is Marauder only getting updated in the splash?
Correct, we will be updating the current Marauder splash

woops, didn't phrase that correctly

 I meant to say if the Marauder Warwick/Ashe splash is getting re-done or only Warwick is getting updated in it, my bad XD
I meant that we are going to be updating the current one that exists right now. So just updating Warwick in it

quick question in future vgus, would you consider make a release chroma pack? i know all the redone skins and base model is alot of work but having a semi new skin for a old champ in the form of a recolor would be cool
Will Big Bad Warwick still make me die laughing? ;3
We need a better view of all the mana pots he's hoarding.
